column1: Words included in the database and their values in AoA Logistic Regression (AoA_LR), AoA based on the 75% rule (AoA_75), Adults Rated AoA (Rated AoA), Adults Picture Naming Times (RTs), Adults Rated Typicality (Typ _Ad), Adults Rated Familiarity (Fam_Ad), Corpus Word Frequency (Frq_Ad), Children Essays Word Frequency (Frq_Es), Word Length in letters (L)
